00020 
00021 #ifndef CCN_SyncHashCache
00022 #define CCN_SyncHashCache
00023 
00024 struct SyncRootStruct; // defined in SyncRoot
00025 
00026 enum SyncHashState {
00027     SyncHashState_null = 0,      /**< empty, not much known */
00028     SyncHashState_local = 1,     /**< a local node exists */
00029     SyncHashState_remote = 2,    /**< a remote hash has been seen */
00030     SyncHashState_fetching = 4,  /**< remote node is being fetched */
00031     SyncHashState_covered = 8,   /**< remote hash known covered by the local root */
00032     SyncHashState_storing = 16,  /**< local node is queued to be stored */
00033     SyncHashState_stored = 32,   /**< local node has been stored */
00034     SyncHashState_marked = 64    /**< cache entry has been marked */
00035 };
00036 
00037 struct SyncHashCacheHead {
00038     struct SyncRootStruct *root;        /**< the parent root */
00039     uintmax_t probes;                   /**< number of cache probes */
00040     uintmax_t misses;                   /**< number of cache misses */
00041     uintmax_t lastIndex;                /**< assigned by order of creation */
00042     size_t len;                         /**< number of entries */
00043     uint32_t mod;                       /**< the mod to use */
00044     struct SyncHashCacheEntry **ents;   /**< the vector of hash chains */
00045 };
00046 
00047 struct SyncHashCacheEntry {
00048     struct SyncHashCacheHead *head;     /**< the parent head */
00049     struct SyncHashCacheEntry *next;    /**< the next entry in the hash chain */
00050     struct SyncHashCacheEntry *storing; /**< the next entry in the storing chain */
00051     enum SyncHashState state;           /**< state bits */
00052     uintmax_t index;                    /**< assigned by order of creation */
00053     uint32_t busy;                      /**< the tree worker usage count */
00054     uint32_t small;                     /**< the small hash */
00055     struct ccn_charbuf *hash;           /**< hash used to reach this entry */
00056     struct SyncNodeComposite *ncL;      /**< the local node in memory */
00057     struct SyncNodeComposite *ncR;      /**< some remote node in memory */
00058     int64_t lastUsed;                   /**< time when entry last used in compare */
00059     int64_t lastLocalFetch;             /**< time when local entry last fetched */
00060     int64_t lastRemoteFetch;            /**< time when remote entry last fetched */
00061 };
00062 
00063 /**
00064  * lookup a full hash in a hash table (raw contents, no tag)
00065  * @returns entry if it exists
00066  */
00067 struct SyncHashCacheEntry *
00068 SyncHashLookup(struct SyncHashCacheHead *head,
00069                const unsigned char *xp, ssize_t xs);
00070 
00071 /**
00072  * based on the raw hash, ensure that a remote cache entry exists
00073  * ent->state |= set
00074  */
00075 struct SyncHashCacheEntry *
00076 SyncHashEnter(struct SyncHashCacheHead *head,
00077               const unsigned char *xp, ssize_t xs,
00078               enum SyncHashState set);
00079 
00080 /**
00081  * remove the entry (if present)
00082  */
00083 void
00084 SyncHashRemoveEntry(struct SyncHashCacheHead *head,
00085                     struct SyncHashCacheEntry *ce);
00086 
00087 /**
00088  * clear all marks
00089  */
00090 void
00091 SyncHashClearMarks(struct SyncHashCacheHead *head);
00092 
00093 /**
00094  * create a new hash table with the given modulus (mod == 0 uses a default)
00095  */
00096 struct SyncHashCacheHead *
00097 SyncHashCacheCreate(struct SyncRootStruct *root, uint32_t mod);
00098 
00099 /**
00100  * frees the cache resources
00101  * caller must ensure no further use of the cache
00102  * @returns NULL
00103  */
00104 struct SyncHashCacheHead *
00105 SyncHashCacheFree(struct SyncHashCacheHead *head);
00106 
00107 
00108 /**
00109  * fetches the cache entry
00110  * to be eligible, ce != NULL && ce->ncL != NULL
00111  * && (ce->state & SyncHashState_stored) == 1
00112  * @returns < 0 for failure, 0 if not eligible, and > 0 for success
00113  */
00114 int
00115 SyncCacheEntryFetch(struct SyncHashCacheEntry *ce);
00116 
00117 /**
00118  * stores the cahe entry to the repo
00119  * to be eligible, ce != NULL && ce->ncL == NULL
00120  * && (ce->state & SyncHashState_stored) == 0
00121  * @returns < 0 for failure, 0 if not eligible, and > 0 for success
00122  */
00123 int
00124 SyncCacheEntryStore(struct SyncHashCacheEntry *ce);
00125 
00126 #endif
